snippet: The Philadelphia Eagles interviewed Mike McCoy, the Denver Broncos’ offensive coordinator, after a lengthy meeting with Oregon Coach Chip Kelly a night earlier.
abstract: Philadelphia Eagles take their coaching search to Denver to interview Broncos offensive coordinator Mike McCoy after lengthy meeting with Oregon coach Chip Kelly night earlier in Arizona.
lead_paragraph: The Philadelphia Eagles interviewed Mike McCoy, the Denver Broncos’ offensive coordinator, after a lengthy meeting with Oregon Coach Chip Kelly a night earlier.
